body_html: It is unlikely TensorFlow can use NCCL in its current form, as it doesn't fit into TensorFlow's programming and memory model. However, we could implement something similar to leverage the lower-level functionalities. Although I don't have a timeline at this point.

body: It is unlikely TensorFlow can use NCCL in its current form, as it doesn't fit into TensorFlow's programming and memory model. However, we could implement something similar to leverage the lower-level functionalities. Although I don't have a timeline at this point.
